title: Bug 114903 - Default values not displayed in Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When viewing the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog, the default values for the report parameters are not being shown.
OB: When opening the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog, the default values for the report parameters are not present.
EB: When opening the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog, the default values of the report parameters should be displayed.
SR: To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 1. Create several report parameters. 2. Set default values for the report parameters. 3. Drag the report parameters to the Layout. 4. Open the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog and verify that the default values are not displayed.
